whyChooseUs.title: Why Everyone Benefits from Our Platform

roles.title: Customers
roles.description: Easily book vehicle rentals, request roadside assistance, and access trustworthy repair and maintenance services anywhere.

roles.title: Staff
roles.description: Manage rentals, assist customers, update vehicle statuses, and coordinate service requests ‚Äì all from one platform.

roles.title: Station Managers
roles.description: Oversee station operations, manage inventory and staff, and ensure smooth vehicle dispatch and returns every day.

roles.title: Company Owners
roles.description: Monitor fleet usage, customer trends, and financial performance in real-time. Expand your vehicle business with confidence.

roles.title: Technicians
roles.description: Get assigned repair tasks, track issue histories, and manage vehicle service records with efficient digital tools.

roles.title: Private Owners
roles.description: List your personal vehicles for rent or service on our platform and earn income while retaining full ownership control.

roles.title: Investors
roles.description: Track your investment performance, view reports by region or company, and support a growing, eco-driven vehicle service network.

roles.title: Agents (Collaborators)
roles.description: Connect customers with the right vehicle services, earn commission transparently, and grow your own partner network.

faqSection.title: What Would You Like to Ask?

faqs.question: How do I swap batteries at a station?
faqs.answer: When you rent an electric vehicle from B√≠p B√≠p, we provide clear instructions on how to use our smart battery swapping stations. You can swap batteries yourself using your B√≠p B√≠p account at any supported location.

faqs.question: What accessories come with the rental vehicle?
faqs.answer: Each vehicle comes with two helmets, two raincoats, and a charger (if needed). Some vehicles may also include a phone holder, rear carrier, or extra storage depending on the model.

faqs.question: Which vehicle types are available on B√≠p B√≠p?
faqs.answer: We offer a wide range of vehicles including electric motorbikes, bicycles, electric cars, vans, and more ‚Äì all suited for both tourism and delivery needs.

faqs.question: What should I do if I encounter a problem on the road?
faqs.answer: In case of accidents, breakdowns, or any issues, please contact our hotline or request roadside assistance directly through the app. Our technicians will assist you promptly.

about_page.title: About Us
about_page.p1: At B√≠p B√≠p, we are building an advanced platform that transforms how electric vehicle rentals are managed and scaled. Our system empowers multiple stakeholders to participate in a transparent and efficient rental ecosystem ‚Äî from customers and staff to investors, technicians, and business owners.
about_page.p2: Our goal is to streamline all rental operations ‚Äî from booking, maintenance, staff coordination, to performance tracking ‚Äî making it easy for anyone to join the growing e-mobility movement.
about_page.p3: Whether you're a customer looking for a reliable ride, a technician handling maintenance requests, a company owner managing fleets, or even an investor tracking ROI ‚Äî B√≠p B√≠p provides the right tools for you.

roles.customers: Customers ‚Äì Convenient rentals, flexible delivery options, and access to quality electric bikes anytime.
roles.staff: Staff ‚Äì Tools to manage orders, assist users, and handle bikes in real-time.
roles.station_managers: Station Managers ‚Äì Operational oversight, performance tracking, and staff management.
roles.company_owners: Company Owners ‚Äì Centralized control, business analytics, and confident scaling.
roles.technicians: Technicians ‚Äì Maintenance tracking, service history, and task assignments.
roles.private_owners: Private Owners ‚Äì Earn from listed vehicles with full transparency.
roles.investors: Investors ‚Äì Insight into ROI and sustainable business performance.
roles.agents: Agents ‚Äì Commission-based referrals through user-friendly tools.

about_page.p5: We are committed to shaping a smarter, greener future for transportation in Vietnam and beyond.

contact_page.title: Contact
contact_page.description: We'd love to hear from you!

policy_page.title: Privacy & Policy
policy_page.intro: At B√≠p B√≠p, we value your privacy and data protection. We are committed to being transparent with how we handle your data.
policy_page.point1: We do not sell or share your personal information.
policy_page.point2: All transactions and data are secured via industry-standard encryption.

point3.part1: You may request account deletion at any time by contacting

policy_page.footer_note: Please refer to our full privacy policy for more details or contact us directly with any concerns.
